entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
